title: Hamilton sign midfielder Chrysovalantis Kozoronis on deal for rest of season
description: Hamilton have completed the signing of Greece midfiedler Chrysovalantis Kozoronis on a deal until the end of the season.
content: The 25-year-old, known as Kozo, joins the Scottish Premiership club after international clearance was received to seal his move from Greek Superleague side PAS Giannina.Kozo began his career in his hometown Heraklion, playing for Ergotelis for three years until joining PAS Giannina in the summer of 2015.He agreed a short-term deal to join Hamilton earlier this month but that was held up by red tape until late on Friday.Kozo has Europa League experience from the last three seasons and, according to Hamilton's website, has been on the radar of Accies manager Martin Canning for some time.
